charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1101_0100:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] got lost
while walking through the forest.
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1101_0200:
Stomach growling, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] kept wandering until [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] 
ran into Ethan and a hiker.
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_0300:
Oh, hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Fancy running into you out here!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_0401_0500:
That’s not good... Don’t worry, though!
We can tell you the way back!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_0401_0600:
You must be hungry! Give us a few minutes, 
and we’ll whip up something to eat.
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_0402_0800:
Yikes! Are you OK?!
You must have gotten lost.
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_0402_0900:
Give us a few minutes, and we’ll whip up
something to eat!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_1000:
I just met up with my friend here. We were just
about to have a snack ourselves!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_1100:
Ethan and I are camping buddies, you see?
He may be young, but he knows his way around
the forest. A real survivalist, this one!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_1200:
Haha! Luckily, there were a lot of mushrooms and
Berries near camp!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_1300:
Apparently, it’s not against the rules to pick food
like this on Pasio! How swell is that?
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_1400: Of course, taking too much is just bad manners!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_0301_1500:
Wow, your friend was right!
You are an outdoor expert!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_0301_2000:
How would you recommend
cooking them?
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_0401_2100:
Well, eating them raw and really savoring the
flavor is nice, but if I were to choose a way
to cook them...
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_0302_2200: Do we have to eat them raw?
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_0402_2300:
A little uneasy eating them like this? All right!
Then I’ll show you my favorite cooking method!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_2400:
Roasting these ingredients on Cyndaquil’s back
cooks them perfectly!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_2500: Cyndaquil’s the best partner to have around!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_2600: Not only is he great in a Pokémon battle...
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_2700:
I can cook food on his back, and he lights the
way when it’s dark!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_2900: All right! Now let’s put these on the fire!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_3000: I think we’re good to go!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_3400:
Freshly picked and freshly cooked.
It’s good, isn’t it?
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_3500: Let’s throw some more stuff on the fire!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_3700:
What a big mushroom!
And that texture is fantastic!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_3900:
We even have Berries for dessert!
Take as many as you want!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_4000: Oof, I’m stuffed! Thanks for the food!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_4100:
Now that we’re full, you said you were lost,
right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_4200: That’s right! I can tell you how to get back.
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_4300:
Hmm, it looks like it might get dark on the way
back. Why don’t we all go together?
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_4400: We know the way back perfectly!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_4500:
Besides, with Cyndaquil providing light, we should
be able to navigate the forest just fine!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_4600: You just keep saving the day, don’t you, buddy!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_4700:
As long as you have the right knowledge
and friends, adventures out in the wild
can be really fun!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_4800:
It’s really rewarding to explore Pasio...
Maybe we can go exploring together next time!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2311_1201_0100:
Are you practicing golf, miss?
That’s really cool! Can I try, too?
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2311_1201_0200:
Oh, are you interested in golf?
I’d be happy to teach you.
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2311_1201_0300:
Awesome!
Then in return, let’s have a Pokémon battle
before we get started! Do we have a deal?
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2311_0101_0100: Behold our graceful skills and moves!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2311_0501_0100:
Whew! Battling with you was like a refreshing
breeze! Thank you.
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2311_0501_0200:
I had tons of fun, too! Now, let’s practice golf—
Hm?
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2311_0501_0300:
It looks like your partner Pokémon just caught
a tail wind. This is a sign that Cyndaquil is ready
to evolve.
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2311_0501_0400:
You’re gonna get even stronger?!
You really are the best partner, Cyndaquil!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2311_0501_0500:
This means we can have tons more
adventures together!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2312_1201_0100:
Hah! Looks like your Quilava’s about to turn
up the heat!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2312_1201_0300:
No matter the plight, even affright, I will light up
bright the more I fight. What am I?
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2312_0101_0100: The answer...right after this Pokémon battle! Hah!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2312_0501_0100:
That was a good battle! You have a lot of
potential to get even hotter!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2312_0501_0200: I figured out the answer! It’s...
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2312_0501_0300: Did you figure out the answer, too, Quilava?
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2312_0501_0400: Ah, I see! Your Quilava showed the answer!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2312_0501_0500:
Lights up bright the more it fights...
The answer is...Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2312_0501_0600:
Thanks a lot, Blaine! You gave us the answer
to evolving!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2312_0501_0700:
Let’s have more and more battles and get stronger
than ever!
